alert.note: Alert for Logan; Sedgwick (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 1:16PM MDT until July 08 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Logan County in northeastern Colorado... Western Sedgwick County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 200 PM MDT. * At 115 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crook, or 22 miles south of Sidney, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Twin Buttes around 120 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Marks Butte. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
